languages.text: "Невежество отдаляет нас от Императора — так ищите знание и не страшитесь ступать на путь темный и тернистый".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] "В невежестве нет добродетели, ибо невдеующий — это еретик, отрицающий Императора! Лишь постигая путь Его — мы обретаем мы веру!

languages.text: "Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."
languages.original_text: "Невежество отдаляет нас от Императора — так ищите знание и не страшитесь ступать на путь темный и тернистый".

traits.locale_text: "Ignorance leads us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."
"Ignorance leads us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."
"Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."
"Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."
"Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."
"Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."

languages.text: «La ignorancia solo nos alejará del saber del Emperador. Aventúrate, pues, en busca del conocimiento, y no temas la senda de espinas y tinieblas».
languages.original_text: "Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."

traits.locale_text: «La ignorancia solo nos alejará del saber del Emperador. Aventúrate, pues, en busca del conocimiento, y no temas la senda de espinas y tinieblas».

languages.text: 「無知は皇帝の知恵から遠ざけるのみ。だから、知識を求めて一歩踏み出し、茨と暗闇の道を恐れてはいけない」
languages.original_text: "Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「無知は皇帝の知恵から遠ざけるのみ。だから、知識を求めて一歩踏み出し、茨と暗闇の道を恐れてはいけない」

languages.text: “无知只会让我们远离帝皇的智慧。所以勇敢地寻求知识吧，不要惧怕充满荆棘与黑暗的道路。”
languages.original_text: "Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."

traits.locale_text: “无知只会让我们远离帝皇的智慧。所以勇敢地寻求知识吧，不要惧怕充满荆棘与黑暗的道路。”

languages.text: "Ignoranz führt uns nur fort von der Weisheit des Imperators. Zieht also aus auf der Suche nach Wissen, und fürchtet Euch nicht vor dem Pfad der Dornen und der Dunkelheit."
languages.original_text: "Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Ignoranz führt uns nur fort von der Weisheit des Imperators. Zieht also aus auf der Suche nach Wissen, und fürchtet Euch nicht vor dem Pfad der Dornen und der Dunkelheit.

languages.text: « L'ignorance ne peut que nous éloigner de la sagesse de l'Empereur. Alors, cherchez la connaissance, et ne craignez pas les chemins épineux plongés dans les ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."

traits.locale_text: « L'ignorance ne peut que nous éloigner de la sagesse de l'Empereur. Alors, cherchez la connaissance, et ne craignez pas les chemins épineux plongés dans les ténèbres. »

languages.text: "Cehalet bizi yalnızca İmparator'un bilgeliğinden uzaklaştırır. Bundandır ki irfan arayışını sürdür. Dikenlere ve karanlığa bürünmüş yollardan korkma."
languages.original_text: "Ignorance will only lead us away from the Emperor's wisdom. So, go forth in search of knowledge, and fear not the path of thorns and darkness."
